Package tk.shardsoftware.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.shardsoftware.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    College, EntityCannonball, EntityShip
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    To be used for any object in the world that moves or is interactable
    Author:
    James Burnell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected float direction
      The direction the entity is facing in degrees.

      How large the hitbox is in comparison to the entity

      protected boolean isSolid
      Determines if it prevents other entities from moving if they collide

      The maximum speed the entity is allowed to travel at

      The entity's current position in the world

      Tells the World object if the entity should be deleted

      The texture used to depict the entity

      The vector the entity is traveling in (unnormalized)

    • Field Detail

      • maximumSpeed

        protected float maximumSpeed
        The maximum speed the entity is allowed to travel at

      • direction

        protected float direction
        The direction the entity is facing in degrees. Note that this can be different than the direction it is moving.

      • velocityVec

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 velocityVec
        The vector the entity is traveling in (unnormalized)

      • positionVec

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 positionVec
        The entity's current position in the world

      • width

        protected float width

      • height

        protected float height

      • hitbox

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle hitbox
        The hitbox of the entity. Note that this does not rotate.

      • hitboxScale

        protected float hitboxScale
        How large the hitbox is in comparison to the entity

      • worldObj

        protected World worldObj
        The World object the entity belongs to

      • remove

        public boolean remove
        Tells the World object if the entity should be deleted

      • texture

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion texture
        The texture used to depict the entity

      • ignoreWorldCollision

        protected boolean ignoreWorldCollision

      • ignoreEntityCollision

        protected boolean ignoreEntityCollision

      • isSolid

        protected boolean isSolid
        Determines if it prevents other entities from moving if they collide

        protected Entity​(World worldObj,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float w,
                 float h)
        Constructor for Entity.
        Parameters:
        worldObj - World object that the entity will be part of
        x - x-position of the entity
        y - y-position of the entity
        w - width of the entity
        h - height of the entity

        Parameters:
        nextHitbox - The other hitbox
        Returns:
        true if collided, false otherwise
